title: Nokia patent suit triggers Germany sales ban on Acer and Asus PCs - digitimes
summary_full: Nokia patent suit triggers Germany sales ban on Acer and Asus PCs  digitimesAcer and Asus shut down support for PC and laptops in wake of patent dispute ruling, drivers and updates inaccessible to existing customers — German website finds a workaround (Update)  Tom's HardwareAcer and Asus halt sales in Germany following patent dispute with Nokia  UA.NEWSGerman court bans PCs from Taiwan’s Acer, Asus in patent dispute  Taiwan NewsPodcast #857 - Acer and ASUS Ban, More PC Hardware Doom and Gloom, Cheap USB Speakers, Sparky RTX 5090 and MORE  PC Perspective
